appAboutTitle.title: About Us
appAboutTitle.subTitle1: We Create Magical moments with the music company
appAboutTitle.subTitle2: So this is the tale of our castaways they’re here for a long long time. They’ll have to make the best of things its an uphill climb. Come and dance on our floor. Take a step that is new.
